about.title: About Us
about.text1: The first official weather forecast ever appeared on the first of August 1861. The legendary vice-admiral Robert Fitzroy, a royal-navy officer and pioneer in meteorology, was collecting data for his Meteorological Office from 15 land stations across England. Nowadays, there are over 40000 stations across our planet, accessible via free, affordable, advanced, and accurate technologies.
about.text2: For this project, we used node.js â€“ one of the most popular run-time environments for JavaScript.
about.text3: Node.js helps create fast and advanced web applications. It has many additional libraries/modules for any purpose.
